org.kepler.stratosphere.io.input

Class DataFileInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.api.common.io.FileInputFormat<eu.stratosphere.types.Record>
      • eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.io.FileInputFormat
        • org.kepler.stratosphere.io.input.DataFileInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eu.stratosphere.api.common.io.InputFormat<eu.stratosphere.types.Record,eu.stratosphere.core.fs.FileInputSplit>, java.io.Serializable

    public class DataFileInputFormat
extends eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.io.FileInputFormat
    Read the whole file as one pair. key is the file name, value is file content. Built based on eu.stratosphere.pact.common.io.TextInputFormat class by changing readRecord() and createInputSplits().
    Author:
    Jianwu Wang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
